conbody.p: The Events app is perfect for creating any type of event. System Admins can configure the event to allow discounts for early registrants, restrict event registration for elite members, swiftly process payments, track sponsors, speakers, and all related event tasks. Prior to creating an event, Admins must first create a properly configured Community and ensure that it is Active.

Secondly, Admins must decide if the event they are creating is recurring or non-recurring. If the event is recurring, all of the event components (ticket types, schedule items, venues, etc.) must be created via related lists on the Event Category record to ensure reusability. Conversely, if the event is non-recurring, Admins can create all event components directly from the Event record. All events must have an Event Category, regardless if the event is recurring or not. The system automatically creates an "Uncategorized" Event Category providing Admins with the ease of linking a non-recurring Event to an Event Category without navigating away from the Event record.
